SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.math.matrix

Interface Matrix

All Superinterfaces:
Iterable<Double>, Number
All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericMatrix
public interface Matrix extends Number, Iterable<Double>

Matrix

This interface defines the contract for a matrix representation.

  • Method Details

    • get

      double get(int row, int column) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Retrieves the element at the specified row and column in the matrix.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index of the element.
      column - The column index of the element.
      Returns:
      The value of the element at the specified row and column.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the provided row or column index is out of bounds.

    • set

      @Nonnull Matrix set(int row, int column, double value) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the element at the specified row and column in the matrix to the given value and returns this matrix instance.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index of the element to set.
      column - The column index of the element to set.
      value - The value to set at the specified row and column.
      Returns:
      This matrix instance after setting the element.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the provided row or column index is out of bounds.

    • add

      @Nonnull Matrix add(double s)
      Adds a scalar value to all elements of the matrix and returns a new matrix with the result.
      Parameters:
      s - The scalar value to add to the matrix elements.
      Returns:
      A new matrix resulting from adding the scalar value to the elements.

    • apply

      @Nonnull Matrix apply(@Nonnull UnaryOperator<Double> operator)
      Applies the given unary operator element-wise to each element of the matrix.
      Parameters:
      operator - The unary operator to be applied.
      Returns:
      A new matrix where the given operator has been applied element-wise.

    • negate

      @Nonnull Matrix negate()
      Returns a new matrix where all elements are negated (multiplied by -1).
      Returns:
      A new matrix with negated elements.

    • iterator

      @Nonnull Iterator<Double> iterator()
      Returns an iterator over the elements in the matrix. The iterator iterates through the elements row by row and provides a view of the matrix elements as Double values.
      Specified by:
      iterator in interface Iterable<Double>
      Returns:
      An iterator over the matrix elements.

    • resize

      @Nonnull GenericMatrix resize(int numRows, int numColumns)
      Creates a new matrix with the specified dimensions by resizing the original matrix.
      Parameters:
      numRows - The number of rows in the new matrix.
      numColumns - The number of columns in the new matrix.
      Returns:
      A new GenericMatrix instance with the resized dimensions.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the new dimensions are not valid (non-negative).

    • copy

      @Nonnull Matrix copy()
      Returns a new matrix that is a deep copy of the current matrix.
      Returns:
      A new matrix that is a deep copy of the current matrix.
